DOC.brief_summary: This 12-week study evaluate effectiveness Clinician-Managed Interpersonal Psychotherapy ( CM-IPT ) treat postpartum depression compare CM-IPT standard IPT .
DOC.detailed_description: CM-IPT deliver 12 session course year . Standard IPT deliver 12 session first 12 week treatment assignment .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Women 8 24 week postpartum Meet DSMIV criterion Major Depression Hamilton Rating Scale Depression score 12 Exclusion criterion : Active substance abuse Psychotic disorder
